price: 22. Waa Allaah, uusan jirin ilaah kale (oo xaq lagu caabudo) Isaga maahee, Ogsoonaha waxa aan muuqan iyo waxa muuqda. Waa Naxariistaha, Naxariista Badan.
arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِۖ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-lahu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati huwa al-raḥmānu al-raḥīmu
